events.message: I received the wrong item and would like to request a refund for my order placed last week.
The issue has been classified under the refund category based on customer request for money back.
The case has been assigned to agent Mia Thompson for further assistance with the refund request.
Hello! I’m Mia, I’ll help you with your refund. Could you please provide your order number and the details of what you received?
To process your refund quickly, please send us photos of the item you received and your original receipt.
Here is the order number 789654 and attached photos. The item I got is completely different and unusable.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate a full refund and send you a prepaid return label within the next 24 hours.
That sounds great, thank you for the prompt reply and quick action on my refund request.
Your refund case has been resolved, and the return label has been sent to your email. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
Just checking in to ensure you received the refund and return label without any issues. Please contact us if you have any questions.
We are closing this case now as the refund has been completed successfully. Thank you for your patience.
You will shortly receive a survey to rate your support experience. We appreciate your feedback to improve our service.
